Meaningful Names

Use Intention-Revealing Names

Class Names

Class names should be noun phrases (e.g. Customer, AddressParser).

Method Names

Method names should be verb phrases (e.g. deletePage).

Don’t Pick Clever Names

Say what you mean. Mean what you say.

Pick One Word per Concept

Pick one word for one abstract concept and stick with it (e.g. get, retrieve, fetch are confusing if all used in same codebase just choose one).
